description: Selected a broad range of courese, with modules in: cyber-security, model checking, neural networks, digital forensics, software engineering, and data science. Completing a research project about strategy synthesis in concurrent stochastic games for multi-agent resource allocation. Completing part-time (over 2 years).
Computer science is a broad and fascinating field with countless practical applications underpinned by a strong theoretical and mathematical basis.
Completed by high school education at St David's Marist Inanda. Matriculated as Dux Scholar with 8 distinctions.
